snippet: Brian McCann homered among his career high-tying four hits and the New York Yankees bounced back to end a three-game losing streak, beating the Boston Red Sox 5-1 Wednesday night....

headline.print_headline: McCann Gets 4 Hits, Yanks Top Red Sox to End Skid
headline.main: McCann Gets 4 Hits, Yanks Top Red Sox to End Skid

lead_paragraph: Brian McCann homered among his career high-tying four hits and the New York Yankees bounced back to end a three-game losing streak, beating the Boston Red Sox 5-1 Wednesday night.
